title: (x) Looking for font similar to "Aqua di Parma label - various {gang}
content:
i'm guessing this is hand drawn mark but client likes it  
 [http://www.acquadiparma.it/home\_lang.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20130607102903/http:/www.acquadiparma.it/home_lang.htm "http://www.acquadiparma.it/home\_lang.htm")

shorlist recommendations please people  
thank you
author: jades

comments.content:
Those are all good matches. Alternatives:  
 [Interstate](http://web.archive.org/web/20130607102903/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=FB.7154.0.1&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=ACQUA+DI+PARMA&sampleSize=32)  
 [Engravers Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20130607102903/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=BT.107551.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=ACQUA+DI+PARMA&sampleSize=32)

And less of an exact match, but similarly "antique":  
 [Monotype Grotesque](http://web.archive.org/web/20130607102903/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=LH.107996.0.3&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=ACQUA+DI+PARMA&sampleSize=32)
